p: From the collaborated evidence it is clear that ZIKV-RT-PCR has the desired specificity and sensitivity for detection on applicable flavivirus based on clinical symptoms observed ( Robin and Mouchet, 1974, Hegde et al., 2015, Weaver and Forrester, 2015, Faye et al., 2013, Lanciotti et al., 2008). In its enhancement and scaling up as a screening technique, complementing more funding and investment in novel, safe and efficacious therapeutics agents and vaccines in meeting the vulnerable population and travel medicine immunization programs hopes and needs will be of immense benefit to cases profiling and management ( Chang et al., 2015, Abraham et al., 2015, Petersen et al., 2016b).
